$comment: JSON Schema describing the document format for JSON Selling Partner Listings Feeds Processing Report (v2).
title: Selling Partner JSON Listings Feed Processing Report (v2)

header.title: Processing Report Header
header.description: Header information about the feed submission.

sellerId.title: Selling Partner Identifier
sellerId.description: Identifier for the Selling Partner, such as the Merchant Account or Vendor Code.

version.title: Feed Version
version.description: Version of the JSON Selling Partner Listings Feeds specification used for the feed submission.

feedId.title: Feed Identifier
feedId.description: The identifier for the feed. This identifier is unique only in combination with a seller ID.

issues.title: Issues Encountered Processing Messages
issues.description: Issues containing message processing information for the Selling Partner.

items.title: Issue
items.description: Issue containing message processing information corresponding to an individual listings data submission.

messageId.title: Message Identifier
messageId.description: Identifier for the message that is unique within this feed submission. Correlated to Identifiers provided in the submitted feed. Not provided if the error is not related to a message (e.g. feed formatting issue).

code.title: Error Code
code.description: An Optional error code that maps to documentation.

message.title: Localized Error Message
message.description: Localized Error Message Associated with the issue encountered.

attributeName.description: Name of the attribute associated with the issue, if applicable.

summary.title: Processing Report Summary
summary.description: Aggregate Count of Errors, Warnings, and the status of message submissions.

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: Number of errors encountered processing the feed.

warnings.title: Warnings
warnings.description: Number of warnings encountered processing the feed.

messagesAccepted.title: Messages Accepted
messagesAccepted.description: Number of messages that were accepted, the associated updates are being applied.

messagesInvalid.title: Messages Invalid
messagesInvalid.description: Number of messages that were invalid, the associated updates will not be applied.
